name: Cardifacts
description:
Cardifacts is a 2.5D dungeon crawler, card collection roguelite platformer. 

Traverse through a randomized dungeon full of dangerous enemies and bountiful treasures. Combine action-combat with powerful Cardifact abilities to defeat the monsters that oppose you. Death is not the end, use it to come back even more powerful than before.

Controls

Controller (Xbox) - Recommended KeyboardLeft Stick - Move 
A - Jump 
X - Attack
RT - Sprint/Dash 
LT - Show Cards 
AXBY - Use Card (After Showing Them) 
LB - Lock Cards
Start - Pause W&D - Move 
Space - Jump 
Shift - Sprint/Dash 
Left Click - Attack 
Right Click - Use Selected Card 
1,2,3,4 - Use # Card 
Esc - Pause The Team

Cardifacts  was developed by Helium Smiles. This was a capstone project for our game development degrees at New England Institute of Technology. This game was made in 20 weeks.
